# 杀神三式 - 坏熊猫

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/shashen-sanshi
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/shashen-sanshi
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install shashen-sanshi
shashen-sanshi <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g shashen-sanshi
shashen-sanshi <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
